        public static double getExp(double d)
        Gets the exponent of a double as if the number was in scientific notation. This is used by the auto plot ticking functions.
        Parameters:
        d - the number
        Returns:
        the exponent of this number

        Computes the value of the modified Bessel function of the first kind of order 0.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the value of the function From: A Numerical Library for Scientists and Engineers, Hang T. Lau (2004), Chapman & Hall ISBN 1-58488-430-4
